overview: Chase Williams decides to take his hot, horny buddies to his home town of Austin Texas; and, it turns into some tasty, triple twink trouble in the biggest, and best of ways! With a spicy mix of Williams’ hometown homies, and some ass- hungry, new acquaintances, the boys make the meat-banging most of this guy’s trip. Friends fuck, hearts are broke, then mended, and all along the wild way, a thrusty threesome, and hot bodied hijinks with some of your fan fav fuck stars! Don’t miss this epic journey as the boys burn brightly through too-hot Texas, “Stealing Hearts” along the way!
title: Stealing Hearts
